HOME.TITLE: WEB DEV / PAZDZIOR
HOME.SUBTITLE: I specialize in turning concepts into functional web solutions using modern frameworks, responsive design, and clear communication to ensure every project meets expectations and exceeds goals.

ABOUT_ME.SUBTITLE: ABOUT ME
ABOUT_ME.TITLE: MORE THAN JUST FRONTEND DEVELOPER
ABOUT_ME.ART_P_1: Skilled in creating prototypes and mockups with Figma, making it easier for clients to see ideas before development. I am able to bridge the gap between concept and final product.
ABOUT_ME.ART_P_2: Experienced in multi-person projects, using GitLab and modern workflows to keep everything organized and moving smoothly. I value clear communication and working towards a common goal.
ABOUT_ME.ART_P_3: Skilled at building applications that work seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and smartphones. I make sure every project adapts to different screen sizes and delivers a smooth user experience on any device.

SKILLS.SUBTITLE: SKILLS
SKILLS.TITLE: FULL-STACK DEVELOPER
SKILLS.P: I am a Full-Stack Developer experienced in building everything from responsive mobile interfaces to advanced web applications. I work confidently with databases, backend systems, and modern frontend frameworks to deliver complete, scalable solutions.

FOOTER.P: Ready to take your project forward. What are you waiting for?
